      • loadDishesPage

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity loadDishesPage(@PageableDefault(page=0,size=20) @SortDefault.SortDefaults(value=@SortDefault(sort="name",direction=ASC))
                                                                          org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable,
                                                                          java.lang.Integer[] categoryIn,
                                                                          java.lang.Integer[] categoryNotIn,
                                                                          java.lang.Integer[] ingredientIn,
                                                                          java.lang.Integer[] ingredientNotIn,
                                                                          java.lang.Double maxPrice,
                                                                          java.lang.String like)
        Parameters:
        pageable - object that contains order of sorting, pages number, page items count
        categoryIn - the categories id that should be in results
        categoryNotIn - the categories id that shouldn't be in results
        ingredientIn - the ingredients id that should be in results
        ingredientNotIn - the ingredients id that shouldn't be in results
        maxPrice - max price of the dish
        like - search query
        Returns:
        dished in current page with specified filters

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity add(@RequestParam(value="file")

                                                                @RequestParam(value="dish")
                                                                Dish dish)
                                                         throws AlreadyExistsException,
                                                                NotValidDataException
        Parameters:
        file - image of dish
        dish - dish with all fields specified
        Returns:
        created dish
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - if dish is already exsisted
        NotValidDataException - in case some fields specify not valid data
